data.text: @SenJohnHoeven @SenKevinCramer Wonder why the republican congressmen flew to Russia in July 2018, Steve Daines-Montana, John Hoeven-N.D., Ron Johnson-Wis., John Kennedy-LA, Jerry Morgan-Kan, John Thune-S.D., Kay Grainger-Texas, and Richard Shelby-Alabama.
@SenJohnHoeven @SenKevinCramer Did you talk to them about why you were in russia in 2018?
